product_name: Black Diamond Lockdown Ice Axe Leash
long_description: Intuitive and secure, Black Diamond(R)'s Lockdown Leash uses a unique slipknot configuration for superb ice tool security. Adjustable nylon web leash with padded wrist loop secures around wrist quickly with a simple slipknot. Releases with a quick tug of the easy-grab pull loop, oversized so gloved hands can grab it. Leash aids in support and balance as well as acting as a safety tether.
short_description: Intuitive and secure, Black Diamond(R)'s Lockdown Leash uses a unique slipknot configuration for superb ice tool security.
